Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>That Yunobo, used to always pester me. "Boss this,"
and "Boss that." Now look at him! A sage!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>That Yunobo, used to always pester me.
"Boss this," and "Boss that." Now look at
him! A sage!
He's always been a simple fella, so ya
can't always count on him for everythin'.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>But when there's a job needs doin', he'll
see that it gets done.

If you run into a wall, there's no better
time to holler for him.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>But when he really wants to, he gets the
job done.

If you run into a wall, there's no better
time to holler for 'im.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If not for this pesky back of mine, I'd be
pitchin' in left and right.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Despite that...<sp:5:2:0>
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yunobo always seems to ask an awful lot
of you.<sp:5:1:0> He's a simple fella, so you can't
count on him for everythin'.
But when there's a job needs doin', he'll
see that it gets done.

If you run into a wall, there's no better
time to holler for 'im.
